channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
Ok, so i had my server up for a night, and i decided to keep it up all night, so it was working. then, when i woke up, there was an error on the server command prompt window, so i tried to restart the server, and it says that its online, and my no-ip says that its up to date, but i cant connect. I dont know why its doing this. If someone has some troubleshooting idea's or has a answer to my problem that would be very appreciated :D
thanks in advance

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Keykcm Keykcm
item.description:
@Keykcm wrote:

yeah i can connect to the server using that…what does that mean?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

try logging in with 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Keykcm Keykcm
item.description:
@Keykcm wrote:

I did, that didnt do anything…it says that the server is online, and it opens up the little vpanel thingy where i can yell to the server and kick everyone off, but when i try and connect it says error connecting to host, and in the command prompt window it doesnt even say that i tried to connect, it just says that is has started the server

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

make sure you have the no-ip DUC running maybe. idk

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Keykcm Keykcm
item.description:
@Keykcm wrote:

Ok, one…how do i restart my serveR? like recompile it and then run it again, if so…already did that. And restarting my computer, already did that too…and it still doesnt work, and its not my ip address cause i can host it on my dads comp thats in the other room, just not mine…idk why

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

Well if you want to keep your screensaver off just edit your settings in control panel. Make it so the screen saver goes off in like 500000000 minutes.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

restart your server. make sure its not nulled. if that dont work restart your computer and that will reset everything.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Keykcm Keykcm
item.description:
@Keykcm wrote:

Yeah, thats what happened, the screeen server went on…but how do i like turn that stuff back on so that me and other people can play my server?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

if you dont have a dedi/vps then make sure your screen saver dosnt turn on during the night. mine did that and made everything loose connection. (rsbot, server, everything)

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

if you are trying to connect with your no-ip then try connecting to 0.0.0.0. if you are saying that your players cannot connect then im not sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

Turn your firewall off?

Read full topic
